price: Wͻyε εdͻm a wͻbɛdi nkoguo sεdeε Akuo-akuo dͻm a wͻdii kan no (dii nkoguo no).
arabic: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun mina al-aḥzābi
